description:
John Spence is recognized as one of the Top 100 Business Thought Leaders in America, one of the Top 100 Small Business Influencers in America, and one of the Top 500 Leadership Development Experts in the World. 
In these nine videos, John covers the essential skills necessary to build a highly successful career. Topics include communications, leadership, team building, conflict resolution, negations and other helpful business and career lessons.
name: Professional Development
subtitle: Professional Development

episodes.description: One of the most critical areas for career success, this section covers advanced questioning, the five levels of listening, body language, social styles and several more communication skills.
episodes.title: Advanced Communications

episodes.description: How to create a culture where people have high levels of both personal and mutual accountability and consistently deliver the required business results.
episodes.title: The Essentials of Accountability

episodes.description: Based on more than 20 years of research and work with hundreds of companies around the world, this video addresses four key elements that are the foundation of building a highly successful organization.
episodes.title: Achieving Business Excellence

episodes.description: Developed through direct work with leaders of top companies and a research study of 10,000 high potential employees, this video talks about the seven characteristics of a leader that people would willingly follow.
episodes.title: Leader of the Future

episodes.description: A step-by-step outline for specifically how to become a one of the top people in your field and position yourself as a partner, peer and trusted advisor to your customer.
episodes.title: How to be a Trusted Advisor

episodes.description: Based in part on ideas from the Harvard Negotiations Program, this session outlines six essential elements for being a highly successful negotiator and makes them simple to understand and apply.
episodes.title: The Fundamentals of Negotiation

episodes.description: A skill that is rarely taught, this session covers several critical steps in reducing conflict, dealing with difficult people and keeping emotions under control.
episodes.title: Conflict Resolution

episodes.description: In this section you will learn several powerful ideas about how to build a happier, more balanced and joyful life and a highly successful career.
episodes.title: Key Ideas for Career Development

episodes.description: How to be a more effective coach, mentor and manager by using the four levels of delegation and the four pieces of paper. Also, the continuum of how to manage a situation with the leader that needs coaching.
episodes.title: Delegating Down Managing Up
